headline.main: Sikh, Told to Leave Country, Shot in Washington State: Police
headline.print_headline: Sikh, Told to Leave Country, Shot in Washington State: Police

lead_paragraph: A Sikh man was shot and wounded in Washington state by an attacker who approached him in his driveway and told him to leave the country, police and media reported on Saturday.
snippet: A Sikh man was shot and wounded in Washington state by an attacker who approached him in his driveway and told him to leave the country, police and media reported on Saturday....
